org.osmdroid.views.overlay

Class Polygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Overlay
      • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.OverlayWithIW
        • org.osmdroid.views.overlay.Polygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverlayConstants

    public class Polygon
extends OverlayWithIW
    A polygon on the earth's surface that can have a popup-InfoWindow (a bubble). Mimics the Polygon class from Google Maps Android API v2 as much as possible. Main differences:
    - Doesn't support: Z-Index, Geodesic mode
    - Supports InfoWindow.
    See Also:
    Google Maps Polygon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      • draw

        public void draw(Canvas canvas,
                 MapView mapView,
                 boolean shadow)
        Description copied from class: Overlay
        Draw the overlay over the map. This will be called on all active overlays with shadow=true, to lay down the shadow layer, and then again on all overlays with shadow=false. Callers should check isEnabled() before calling draw(). By default, draws nothing. changed for 5.6 to be public see https://github.com/osmdroid/osmdroid/issues/466
        Specified by:
        draw in class Overlay

      • contains

        public boolean contains(MotionEvent event)
        Important note: this function returns correct results only if the Polygon has been drawn before, and if the MapView positioning has not changed.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Returns:
        true if the Polygon contains the event position.

      • onSingleTapConfirmed

        public boolean onSingleTapConfirmed(MotionEvent event,
                                    MapView mapView)
        Description copied from class: Overlay
        By default does nothing (return false). If you handled the Event, return true , otherwise return false. If you returned true none of the following Overlays or the underlying MapView has the chance to handle this event.
        Overrides:
        onSingleTapConfirmed in class Overlay

      • onDetach

        Description copied from class: Overlay
        Override to perform clean up of resources before shutdown. By default does nothing.
        Overrides:
        onDetach in class Overlay
